content: christmas stocking tree ornament a simple and adaptable design by mare allison this top-down sock design with gusset and heel flap is a full sock pattern just in miniature knit in the round on double-pointed needles you can easily add stranded designs stripes or other features to this plain sock the garter stitch top is designed to be like a fur boot top but can also be done in traditional ribbing needles 3 5 or 4mm double pointed needles or magic loop technique with a cable needle 3 5mm crochet hook tapestry needle to secure and weave in ends yarn dk or sport weight yarn small amounts and in multiple colors if desired white yarn for sock top abbreviations k knit p purl st stitch sl - slip ssk slip slip knit https //youtu be/0iiu9ej-lgo k2tog knit two stitches together https //youtu be/ptzsat770i8 chain chain crochet cast on leave 1 m tail for chain stitched crocheted loop for hanging use a stretchy cast on… i used old norwegian cast on https //youtu be/bzvznt7f7my with cuff color cast on 20 sts divide on to 4 needles join cuff 1 k 1 round 2 p i round repeat rounds 1 and 2 k 1 round change color leg k 14 rounds in colors and stranded patterns as desired heel flap on 15th round combine stitches on needle 4 with stitches on needle 1 k needle 1 turn 10 sts work the flap with these 10 sts 1 sl 1 st purlwise p to last st sl 1 st purlwise turn 2 k 1 sl 1 x 4 k2 turn repeat row 1 and 2 four more times purl 1 row turn turn heel 1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2 decrease k1 turn 2 sl 1 st p to last st sl 1 turn repeat row 1 but do not turn 6 sts remain gussets pick up 7 sts along the edge of the heel flap plus an extra st at the end k these sts through the back loops to the last 2 sts k last 2 sts decrease in a way that closes any gaps k and combine the sts on needles 2 and 3 top of foot 10 sts pick up and k 8 sts along the other side of the flap in the back loops knitting the first 2 together in a way that closes any gap divide the 6 flap-end sts and move them to flap edge needles 3 on each needle 1 10 sts needle 2 10 sts needle 3 10 sts continue with the gusset needle 1 k to last 2 sts k2 decrease needle 2 k needle 3 ssk k to end continue knitting in rounds until 5 sts remain on needles 1 and 3 20 sts around foot k 10 rounds add sts on needle 1 to those on needle 3 now there are 2 needles with 10 sts on each needle toe round 1 needle 1 k1 ssk k to
